post.body: Sweet to code on the road.. and now with an iPhone you can tweet along the way!How cool. Merry Christmas!
thank you for YLNT podcast. Odd, curious perspectives on the world. http://tinyurl.com/3tu8qx
good luck! I hope the snow from Denver doesn't get you stuck sleeping in some strange airport!
Finished Gears of War 2 finally. Took a small break from coding to save the world -- u r welcome. Great game, btw. 9.5
Poor Dex. Been sick for a week and several times today. Gotta get over this tummy bug.
Now that all the noise in the household network is settled & football is on record, it's time 2 code. I'm getting close 2 Alpha on new app
Trying out TweetDeck out as a twttr client... pretty interesting. http://bit.ly/ILZwj
sending my Pops a message on the methodology of Twitter. Help him out @buckmaher.
Bravo @buckmaher. Great to have you around here. No worries. It takes everyone a little time to aclimate.
Already at half the sales of yesterday in the app store by 10:30 this morning. Merry Christmas.
Ah to be 3 in anticipation of Santa tonight. Very interested in the cookie plate and carrots for Rudolph. Should sleep till 10 am, right?
Christmas shopping adieu. Folks were all pleasant and things were found. Very excited for the next 18 hours in Dexter's life!
Out to do some "last minute" holiday shopping... I hear the shelves are bare and the patrons mad.
I found the solution to any type-A'ness anyone may have. Allow a 3-year-old to help you wrap presents!
Finishing up an enourmous Target trip. You are welcome world economy!
That is coupled with a return to pre-Thanksgiving sales figures of my iPhone apps.
Just learned my salary was to be cut (permanently) by 5% starting January 1st. -- It begins
Wow. Chrystler to shut down for a month. Ford to stay closed for an extra week in January. Could be ugly.
It's been one long week. One of those that no matter how hard I work I simply can't stay ahead of the flood. Santa. Bring me sleep, please.
Brrr. When did colorado move to the mid-west? http://twitpic.com/t29b
